column4: I've successfully mounted /home on a separate primary partition using the instructions at https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Partitioning/Home/Moving .  But I just tried it again and noticed something odd (to me) as it is copying /home to /media/home.  It spends a lot of time telling me that countless ecryptfs files have "vanished".  I don't remeber if it did this when I moved /home several months ago so I don't know if this is a bad thing.  I a
